sentences.en: A small number — five, to be exact—have been bad.
sentences.cn: 一小部分——确切地说是5个——已经坏了。

sentences.en: Do you really think I could get the exact thing I want?
sentences.cn: 你真的认为我能够得到我想要的东西么？

sentences.en: Find the exact grip that allows you to hit the ball hard.
sentences.cn: 找到能让你大力击球的准确握拍方法。

sentences.en: Forecasting floods is not an exact science.
sentences.cn: 对洪水的预测并不是一门精确科学。

sentences.en: Formal, exact and obstinate, he was also cold, suspicious, touchy and tactless.
sentences.cn: 严肃、严谨、倔强的他同时又冷漠、多疑、敏感、不会变通。

sentences.en: His memory is very exact; he never makes mistakes.
sentences.cn: 他的记忆非常准确, 从不出错.

sentences.en: I hadn't really thought about it until this exact moment.
sentences.cn: 直到这时我才真正开始考虑它。

sentences.en: It has taken until now to pin down its exact location.
sentences.cn: 直到现在才确定了它的准确位置。

sentences.en: It is possible to assign an exact date to this building.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑物的确切年代是可以确定的.

sentences.en: Police are still investigating the exact cause of the accident.
sentences.cn: 警方还在调查这起事故的确切原因。

sentences.en: She gave an exact description of the attacker.
sentences.cn: 她对袭击者的特征作了精确的描述。

sentences.en: She knew the exact location of The Eagle's headquarters.
sentences.cn: 她知道“飞鹰”总部的确切地点。

sentences.en: She metered it and found it to be the exact size.
sentences.cn: 她用仪器测量了一下,发现正好是这个尺寸.

sentences.en: Some concepts in Chinese medicine have no exact equivalent in Western medicine.
sentences.cn: 中医的一些概念在西医中没有完全一样的对应观念。

sentences.en: The difficult operation will exact all the doctor's skill.
sentences.cn: 这困难的手术将需要这位医生拿出全部本领来.

sentences.en: The exact locations are being kept secret for reasons of security.
sentences.cn: 确切地点因为安全原因要保密。

sentences.en: The timing had to be exact.
sentences.cn: 对时机的把握必须精确。

sentences.en: Why can't I remember the exact year we married?
sentences.cn: 为什么我记不起我们结婚的准确年份了？
